tagline: A simple realtime chat using XSockets.NET's Azure Services and JavaScript API
body:
### Welcome to live.xsockets.net Example 3

This is a simple chat application using the Windows Azure hosted XSockets.NET Realtime Framework.  

It uses the publish and subscribe features of XSockets.NET's JavaScript API. In addition to the Realtime communication you got a simple storage that helps you persist data between sessions etc.  

Futher information about XSockets.NET AzureService live.xsockets.net can be found on [http://live.xsockets.net](http://live.xsockets.net)

Regards

Magnus Thor, Team XSockets
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Livexsocketsnetexample3
